DOC.detailed_description: This study entail evaluation Washington Intensive Supervision Program ( WISP ) . WISP program target high-risk parolee Seattle , model HOPE program Hawaii . The purpose evaluation test whether subject assign WISP perform good assign parole-as-usual ( PAU ) number outcome , include drug use , miss appointment , recidivism , prison jail stay , parole revocation . WISP use regular random drug test close community supervision , pair swift certain , modest sanction every detected violation .
DOC.criteria: Inmates release DOC community correction supervision Supervised Seattle CJC ( Community Justice Center ) include field office offender downtown `` Metro '' unit , Southeast Seattle unit , Northgate ( north Seattle ) West Seattle . Have parole supervision discharge date least one year date release entry WISP Level III Sex Offenders Existing assignment supervision precludes WISP . These include : Drug Offender Sentencing Alternative ( DOSA ) Special Sex Offender Sentencing Alternative ( SSOSA ) . Dangerously Mentally Ill ( DMIO )
